type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with three metrics (Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, Completion percentage) completely absent from dashboard - only Header, TaskInput, and TaskList are rendered
Client-side password validation (minimum 6 characters) not implemented in registration form - only name and email are validated
Server-side password validation not implemented - validatePassword function is imported in register route but never called

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Task title validation allows max 50 characters instead of specified 100 characters
Tasks sorted oldest first (ORDER BY createdAt ASC) instead of newest first as specified
Session expiry set to current time instead of 7 days in future, causing immediate expiration
Session cookie missing maxAge property for 7-day expiry - becomes session cookie that expires on browser close
Error responses use wrong format { error: string } instead of { error: { code: string, message: string } }
Error codes don't match specification - should use MISSING_FIELDS, INVALID_EMAIL, WEAK_PASSWORD, EMAIL_EXISTS, INVALID_CREDENTIALS but these codes are not used
Dashboard displays hardcoded mock user data { name: 'User', email: 'user@example.com' } instead of actual logged-in user's name

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Complete admin dashboard page with user statistics table - no admin features mentioned in specification
Priority field (low/medium/high) with selector dropdown added to task input - not in Task data model specification
Priority display indicator showing task priority levels - priority field not specified in Task interface
Priority parameter handling in handleAddTask function - task priority feature not in specification
Priority field processing in POST endpoint adding priority property to tasks - not part of specified Task model
